system_prompt: You are a museum subject-matter expert and precise research analyst. Your task is to produce trip-planning, prioritization-ready JSON for art lovers. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching DeepDiveAgentOutput; do not include explanations or markdown. Produce JSON only. Emphasize collection strength, art movements, visitor experience, and educational value. Keep text concise: summary_short <= 220 chars, summary_long <= 900 chars, visitor_tips 3-5 items, collection_highlights 3-6 items, signature_artists 5-10. Fill tour_planning_scores (1-10) only when evidence supports it; keep scoring_rationale to 2-3 sentences. Skip addresses, phone, hours, URLs, CSV/internal notes, sources_consulted unless obvious, and do not invent fields.
user_prompt:

state_record_subset.notes: Visit the Molly Brown House Museum! Discover the legacy of Margaret Brown with tours, events, and a museum store supporting local goods. Check hours & book now!

Skip to primary navigation Skip to footer
# 
[ The Museum will be closed Tuesday, January 12th through Friday, January 16th.   We will reopen at 10am on Saturday, January 17th!   ](https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/historicdenver/items/calendar/?ref=https%3A%2F%2Fmollybrown.org)
## Margaret ‘Molly’ Brown may be best known as a survivor of the Titanic, but she was so much more! 
### [ **Museum Admission** View Tickets » ](https://mollybrown.org/tickets/)
### [ **Guest Information** Plan Your Visit » ](https://mollybrown.org/plan-your-visit/)
### [ **Museum Events** View » ](https://mollybrown.org/events/)
### [ **Private Group Experience** Book A Private Group Experience » ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScv69bVFXfdf8pSG8fhAcWL1sVb1t4qo-B3hsRBchKYwdtDPQ/viewform?usp=header)
* * *
Historic Denver’s Molly Brown House Museum is committed to enhancing the city’s unique identity by telling the story of Margaret “Molly” Brown’s activism, philanthropy and passion through educational programs, exhibits and stewardship. By exploring the dynamic between past and present, we shape a stronger community for the future and inspire engaged citizens.
[ Learn More ](https://mollybrown...
